examAnalyze.getExamShiKaoRenShu: select count(*) as shikaonum,tee.studentcount,tee.examid from tbexamstudent tes,tbexamexam tee where tes.examid = tee.examid and tes.begintime is not null and tee.examid = examid
examAnalyze.getExamCanKaoRenShu: select count(*) as cankaonum,tee.examid from tbexamstudent tes,tbexamexam tee where tes.examid = tee.examid and tes.begintime is null and tee.examid = examid
examAnalyze.getExamSumScore: select sum(score) as zongfen,tee.examid from tbexamexam tee,tbexampaperanswer tepa where tee.examid = tepa.examid and tee.examid = examid
examAnalyze.getExamSumScore1: select sum(score) as zongfen, examid from (select distinct tepa.userid,tepa.questionid,tepa.examid, tepa.score from tbexamexam tee,tbexampaperanswer tepa where tee.examid = tepa.examid and tee.examid =examid) a group by a.examid
examAnalyze.getExamRoomSumScore: select sum(tepa.score) as zongfen,tee.examid ,tes.roomid from tbexamexam tee,tbexampaperanswer tepa ,tbexamstudent tes,tbexamroom ter where tee.examid = tepa.examid and tee.examid = tes.examid and tes.begintime is not null and ter.roomid = tes.roomid and tepa.userid = tes.userid and tee.examid = examid group by tes.roomid
examAnalyze.getExamRoomSumScore1: select sum(score) as zongfen,examid ,roomid from (select distinct tepa.userid,tepa.questionid,tepa.score,tepa.examid,tes.roomid from tbexamexam tee,tbexampaperanswer tepa ,tbexamstudent tes,tbexamroom ter where tee.examid = tepa.examid and tee.examid = tes.examid and tes.begintime is not null and ter.roomid = tes.roomid and tepa.userid = tes.userid and tee.examid = examid) a group by roomid
examAnalyze.getExamRoomRenShu: select count(tes.begintime) as shikaonum,(ter.studentnum-count(tes.begintime)) as quekaonum,ter.studentnum,tes.roomid from tbexamstudent tes,tbexamroom ter where ter.roomid = tes.roomid and tes.examid = examid group by tes.roomid
examAnalyze.getExamStudentRightAnswerNumByExamid: select count(*) as daduinum, tepa.userid,tepa.examid from tbexampaperanswer tepa where tepa.score >0 and tepa.examid = examid group by tepa.userid
examAnalyze.getExamStudentWrongAnswerNumByExamid: select count(*) as daduinum, tepa.userid,tepa.examid from tbexampaperanswer tepa where tepa.score <= 0 and tepa.examid = examid group by tepa.userid
examAnalyze.getExamStuRightAndWrongAnsNumByExamid: select count(if(tepa.score>0,true,null)) as daduinum, count(if(tepa.score <=0,true,null)) as dacuonum,tepa.userid,tepa.examid from tbexampaperanswer tepa where tepa.examid = examid group by tepa.userid
examAnalyze.getExamStuRightAndWrongAnsNumByExamid1: select count(if(score>0,true,null)) as daduinum, count(if(score =0,true,null)) as dacuonum,userid,examid from (select distinct tepa.userid,tepa.questionid,tepa.examid,tepa.score from tbexampaperanswer tepa where tepa.examid = examid) a group by userid
examAnalyze.updateTbexamstudent: update Tbexamstudent set rightcount=rightcount, wrongcount=wrongcount,nullcount=nullcount where userid=userid and examid=examid
examAnalyze.queryStudentExamSubmit: select tee.quesnum,tee.examid,tee.examname,tee.begintime,tee.endtime from tbexamexam tee where studentcount >0 and papersetstatus >0 and studentsetstatus >0 and roomsetstatus >0 and teacthersetstatus >0 where order by tee.begintime desc
examAnalyze.queryExamTotalCount: select tee.importscoreafterexam, tee.quesnum,tee.examid as mainexamid,tee.examname,tee.begintime,tee.endtime,tetc.* from tbexamexam tee left join Tbexamtotalcount tetc on tee.examid = tetc.examid where tee.endtime <= time where and studentcount >0 and papersetstatus >0 and studentsetstatus >0 and roomsetstatus >0 and teacthersetstatus >0 order by tee.begintime desc
examAnalyze.queryExamRoomCount: select tee.examid,terc.roomid,ter.roomno,ter.studentnum,terc.shikaorenshu,(ter.studentnum-terc.shikaorenshu) as quekaorenshu,IFNULL(terc.totalscore/terc.shikaorenshu, 0) as avgscore from tbexamroomcount terc,tbexamexam tee,tbexamroom ter where terc.examid = tee.examid and terc.roomid = ter.roomid and tee.examid = ter.examid and tee.examid=examid where order by avgscore desc
examAnalyze.queryExamStudentCount: select tee.quesnum,tee.examid,tu.userid,tes.examscore,tes.ifsubmit, tes.begintime, tes.endtime, tes.rightcount,tes.wrongcount,tes.nullcount,tee.examname,ter.roomno,tu.ticketnum,tes.seatno from tbuser tu,tbexamexam tee,tbexamroom ter ,tbexamstudent tes where ter.examid=tee.examid and ter.roomid = tes.roomid and tu.userid = tes.userid and tee.examid=examid where order by tes.examscore desc
examAnalyze.queryExamStudentDetailsCount: select a.questioncontent,a.rightoptnum,a.rightoptid,b.stuoptnum,b.stuoptionid from (select tq1.questionid,tq1.questioncontent,teod1.optionnum as rightoptnum ,teod1.optionid as rightoptid from tbexamquestion tq1 ,tbexamoptionandanswer teod1,tbexampaperquestion tepq1,tbexamandpaper teap1 where tq1.questionid = teod1.questionid and teod1.isanswer=1 and tq1.questionid = tepq1.questionid and tepq1.paperid = teap1.paperid and teap1.examid = examid) a left join (select tq.questionid,tepa.userid,teod.optionnum as stuoptnum,teod.optionid as stuoptionid from tbexampaperanswer tepa,tbexamquestion tq ,tbexamoptionandanswer teod where tepa.questionid = tq.questionid and tepa.optionid = teod.optionid and tq.questionid = teod.questionid and tepa.examid =examid and tepa.userid = userid) b on a.questionid = b.questionid
examAnalyze.queryExamStudentDetailsCount1: select a.questioncontent,a.rightoptnum,a.rightoptid,b.stuoptnum,b.stuoptionid from (select tq1.questionid,tq1.questioncontent,GROUP_CONCAT(teod1.optionnum ORDER BY teod1.optionnum SEPARATOR '') as rightoptnum ,teod1.optionid as rightoptid from tbexamquestion tq1 ,tbexamoptionandanswer teod1,tbexampaperquestion tepq1,tbexamandpaper teap1 where tq1.questionid = teod1.questionid and teod1.isanswer=1 and tq1.questionid = tepq1.questionid and tepq1.paperid = teap1.paperid and teap1.examid = examid group by questionid) a left join (select tq.questionid,tepa.userid,GROUP_CONCAT(teod.optionnum ORDER BY teod.optionnum SEPARATOR '') as stuoptnum,teod.optionid as stuoptionid from tbexampaperanswer tepa,tbexamquestion tq ,tbexamoptionandanswer teod where tepa.questionid = tq.questionid and tepa.optionid = teod.optionid and tq.questionid = teod.questionid and tepa.examid =examid and tepa.userid = userid group by questionid) b on a.questionid = b.questionid
examAnalyze.queryStudentExamDetailsSubmit: select tu.sex,tu.username,tu.idnumber,tee.quesnum,tee.examid,tu.userid,tes.examscore,tes.rightcount,tes.wrongcount,tes.nullcount, tee.examname,ter.roomno,tu.ticketnum,tes.seatno,tes.begintime,tes.endtime,tes.ifsubmit from tbuser tu,tbexamexam tee,tbexamroom ter ,tbexamstudent tes where ter.examid=tee.examid and ter.roomid = tes.roomid and tu.userid = tes.userid and tee.examid=examid where
examAnalyze.exportStudentExamResult: select ter.roomno, tes.seatno, tu.DSDM,tu.DSMC,tu.SXDM,tu.SXMC,tu.BMXH,tu.JNBH,tu.username as XM,tu.SEX as XBDM,tu.idnumber as SFZH, IFNULL(tes.examscore,'0.00') as ZYCJ,0 as K1,0 as K2,0 as K3,0 as K4,0 as K5,'c' as M1,'c' as M2,'c' as M3, 'c' as M4,'c' as M5,tu.SCHOOL as BYXXMC,tu.CONTACT as LXDH from tbuser tu,tbexamexam tee,tbexamroom ter ,tbexamstudent tes where ter.examid=tee.examid and ter.roomid = tes.roomid and tu.userid = tes.userid and tee.examid in(examids) where
examAnalyze.getUnsubmitUserListByExamid: select examstuid, userid from tbexamstudent tbe where tbe.examid=examid and tbe.ifsubmit=0 and tbe.examscore is null
examAnalyze.queryUnsubmitStuScore: select sum(a.score) tolscore from (select score from tbexampaperanswer where examid=examid and userid=userid group by questionid) a
examAnalyze.queryIsimportanswerByExamid: select isimportanswer from tbexamexam where examid=examid
